"I am thrilled to recommend this company's services without any hesitation." "Vaso Construction Company performed top notched construction work on my home." "I recommend Vaso Construction to anyone seeking high quality workmanship."

We are so impressed with Vaso Construction and the quality of work they performed on our insurance claim/bathroom remodel. Oleh was incredibly easy to work with and his team was fast and efficient. He eased us through the insurance process … More

Oleg and his team were incredible. They replaced our entire downstairs wood flooring and the communication from him was something I've never experienced in construction. He's the best construction person I've ever dealt with. The work was … More Response from the owner 2 months ago Thank you Nick for your kind words, we appreciate your business and looking forward working with you in the future.
